channel.title: Creating ISO CD Image
channel.description:
How would I create a bootable ISO out of data?
Is there any FREE program? Or is it possible
Becuase my friend gave me the files inside his Windows XP disc.
And all I need to do now is covert it into a .iso.

item.title: Creating ISO CD Image
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=".Kaboom, post:1, topic:123440"]How would I create a bootable ISO out of data?

Is there any FREE program? Or is it possible

Becuase my friend gave me the files inside his Windows XP disc.

And all I need to do now is covert it into a .iso.[/quote]

Youâ€™re probably missing the key boot file, which is crucial to your installation if you expect to boot from CD.
